example.name: gerund
example.text: The sole sympathetic character is the prodigal daughter Kate ( Jaclyn Smith ) , and she is tolerable only by virtue of [*-2] having nothing in common with her kinfolk , a truly benighted pack of Southern Protestants whose grim existence [*T*-1] consists mostly of [*] growing peaches and repressing sex .
